name: spin-basic
description: A basic Spin application that directly consumes the opentelemetry-wasi crate

scripts.build: knitwit --out-dir build/wit/knitwit --out-world combined && npx webpack --mode=production && npx mkdirp dist && npx j2w -i build/bundle.js -d build/wit/knitwit -n combined -o dist/spin-basic.wasm
